sQuestion: A manufacturing company makes two sizes of gizmos , the large size and the small size. It takes 25 minutes of machine time and an hour and 10 minutes of labor to make the small size , and 42 minutes of machine time and 1 hour and 17 minutes of labor to make the large size. Each day the company has 56 hours of labor time and 24.5 hours of machine time available. If all the available time is used , how many gizmos of each size can be made per day?

sentences.sentence: A manufacturing company makes two sizes of gizmos , the large size and the small size.

quantities: an hour and 10 minutes of labor
